name: Prosciutto Bites with Mustard Creme Fraiche
author: Dietz & Watson
summary: Prosciutto Bites with Mustard Crème Fraîche are delicious, fancy, and easy to make.
ingredients: 8 ounces Dietz & Watson Prosciutto, thinly sliced
¼ cup Dietz & Watson Whole Grain Dijon Mustard
½ cup creme fraiche (or sour cream)
Salt and cracked pepper to taste
directions: Whisk together the creme fraiche, Dietz & Watson Whole Grain Dijon Mustard, parsley (leaving some leftover for garnish), lemon zest, and salt and pepper
Spread 1/2 tablespoon of mixture on each cracker
Top with a small slice of Dietz & Watson Prosciutto
Garnish with parsley and lemon zest
